wireframe:
WEBSITE WIREFRAME
==================

Section 1: HERO
========================================
Layout: split-50-50
Components: headline, innovation-statement, demo-cta, product-preview
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: split
  Desktop: split-50-50
Spacing: large

Section 2: PROBLEM
========================================
Layout: centered
Components: problem-statement, pain-points
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: centered
  Desktop: centered
Spacing: medium

Section 3: SOLUTION
========================================
Layout: alternating-blocks
Components: solution-explanation, product-features, screenshots
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: alternating-blocks
  Desktop: alternating-blocks
Spacing: large

Section 4: FEATURES
========================================
Layout: grid-3-column
Components: feature-cards, icons, descriptions
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: 2-column
  Desktop: grid-3-column
Spacing: medium

Section 5: TESTIMONIALS
========================================
Layout: carousel
Components: testimonial-cards, logos, quotes
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: carousel
  Desktop: carousel
Spacing: large

Section 6: TEAM
========================================
Layout: grid-4-column
Components: team-cards, photos, roles
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: 2-column
  Desktop: grid-4-column
Spacing: medium

Section 7: CTA
========================================
Layout: centered
Components: headline, beta-signup, waitlist
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: centered
  Desktop: centered
Spacing: large
